resources.string: Intent on this screen is to rate and share the current album/track with your contacts. Current option is via email but texting and adding to social media can be implemented

Mobb Deep was an American hip hop duo from the Queensbridge Houses in New York City.[1] The group consisted of Havoc and Prodigy, and were a hardcore East Coast Hip-Hop group.[2] They were known for their dark, hardcore delivery as exemplified in "Shook Ones (Part II)."[3] Mobb Deep became one of the most successful rap duos in hip hop, having sold over three million records.[2] Two of their notable albums were The Infamous (1995) and Hell on Earth (1996).[4][5] The group briefly disbanded in 2012 but later reunited in 2013.[6] Prodigy died on June 20, 2017.[7]

The API allows you to manage your apps catalog of in-app products and subscriptions. In addition, with the Subscriptions and In-App Purchases API you can quickly retrieve the details of any purchase using a standard GET request. In the request you supply information about the purchase â€” app package name, purchase or subscription ID, and the purchase token. The server responds with a JSON object describing the associated purchase details, order status, developer payload, and other information.
The intent here is to provide additional details for the artist and a link to the wikipedia page if the user wishes to find out more about the artist
The intent here is to have the user purchase either the album or the track from the Google Play store using the Google Play API
